articles.title: SC details assets of 21 judges, including CJI, and their kin
articles.description: The Supreme Court has made asset details of its judges public. Twenty-one out of thirty-three judges, including the Chief Justice, have declared their wealth. This information is available on the court's website. This move follows the 'cash-at-kothi' scandal. Judges will now declare assets upon assuming office and significant acquisitions to the CJI. These declarations will be mandatorily published online.

articles.title: Govt extends PDS coverage
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent SRINAGAR, May 6: In a significant move aimed at strengthening food security across Jammu and Kashmir, the Department of Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Government of Jammu and Kashmir, has enhanced inclusion measures under the Public Distribution System (PDS). Follow the Daily Excelsior channel on WhatsApp The information was given by Minister for Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Transport, Science & Technology, Information Technology, Youth Services & Sports and ARI & Trainings, Satish Sharma, here today [...]The post Govt extends PDS coverage appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: Gut startup The Good Bug raises Rs 100 cr from Susquehanna Asia, others
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: MUMBAI, May 6: Gut startup The Good Bug on Tuesday announced a Rs 100 crore fundraise in a round led by Susquehanna Asia VC. Existing investor Fireside Ventures also participated in the round, a statement said. “This new capital infusion will be pivotal in accelerating our research and development efforts, driving ground-breaking innovations in gut health through rigorous R&D,” co-founder Keshav Biyani said. The company, which focuses on gut bacterial and microbiome science to deliver root-cause solutions for critical health [...]The post Gut startup The Good Bug raises Rs 100 cr from Susquehanna Asia, others appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: “Not Disrespecting Anthony Davis At All”: Penny Hardaway Acknowledges Nico Harrison’s Courage in Trading Luka Doncic
creator: Nickeem Khan
articles.description: The 2025 NBA playoffs may be underway, but that hasn’t shifted people from the Mavericks’ unprecedented decision to trade away Luka Doncic. Mavs general manager Nico Harrison has received a great deal of flack for trading the face of the franchise. However, former Magic star Penny Hardaway gives Harrison flowers for his courage, acknowledging his [...]The post “Not Disrespecting Anthony Davis At All”: Penny Hardaway Acknowledges Nico Harrison’s Courage in Trading Luka Doncic appeared first on The SportsRush.

articles.title: 75 Indians, including 12 women climbers, get permission to climb Mt Everest
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: NEW DELHI, May 6 : Permission has been granted to 441 climbers, including 79 women, from 55 countries as of Monday for climbing Mt Everest, the highest peak in the world, this spring, according to the Department of Tourism. According to Himal Gautam, director at Nepal Tourism Department, permissions have been granted to 44 expeditions from 55 countries to climb the Everest (8,848.86 mt) so far. Among them, 75 are Indian climbers, including 12 women, he said. The Nepal government [...]The post 75 Indians, including 12 women climbers, get permission to climb Mt Everest appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: UK preparing to update 20-year-old defence plan in case of possible foreign attack
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: LONDON, May 6 : The UK government is working to update its 20-year-old defence plan to prepare for an attack by another state, including Russia, amid concerns that Britain is not ready for war, The Telegraph newspaper reported. The updated version of the secret “Homeland Defence Plan” will set out a strategy for the first days after an attack on the British mainland by a hostile foreign state, the report said on Monday, adding that the dossier will outline how [...]The post UK preparing to update 20-year-old defence plan in case of possible foreign attack appeared first on Daily Excelsior.
